description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Board' that renders a 3x3 grid of 'Square' components for a Tic Tac Toe game. It manages highlighting of winning squares based on props.

methods.name: Board({ squares, onSquareClick, winningLine })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the Tic Tac Toe game board, displaying squares and handling highlighting of winning squares.

methods.name: isWinning
methods.description: Helper function to determine if a given square index is part of the winning line.
